title: If Love Were By Design
description: Veronica Mitchell wasn’t looking for love. She was too busy building a career as a shoe designer. All that running around made her bump into William Berks, literally. She broke his nose! Humiliating situations like that kept recurring whenever he was around. However, William didn’t care as long as he got to know the guarded woman he’d heard about for close to a year.This is a full-length novel (well over 95,000 words).
author: Lacy S. Kinsley
